creator: Twin Oak Systems Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Cura™ Tablet revolutionises the way caregivers use technology to provide better and more efficient care for the elderly in long term care homes. It provides relevant information at the point-of-care and which helps to increase caregiver productivity as well as improve the resident’s satisfaction with services provided.

Cura™ Tablet puts information that is relevant to the care of the individual in the hands of the carer where it matters most… at the point of care delivery. And specifically, in a manner that is unbelievably easy to use with no prior knowledge of IT.

Cura™ Tablet is a powerful aid in meeting regulatory compliance with tools such as real-time handover notes, reminders and alerts, “how do I” notes with pictures and sound recordings; interactive text messaging to/from colleagues and connectivity to a various parties that are part of the support ecosystem such as doctors, pharmacists, next of kin and 3rd part suppliers.

Cura™ Tablet works in conjunction with a back-end server. It is web-based and runs ideally on standard 7”Android tablets (ver 4.1 or higher). Cura™ Tablet conforms to the highest UK-NHS security standards to protect data.
descriptionShort: Cura provides information at the point-of-care-delivery in long term care homes

3791 Jalan Bukit Merah, E-Centre #07-22, Singapore 159471

creator: Cura Systems International Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Cura™ Tablet revolutionises the way caregivers use technology to provide better and more efficient care for the elderly in long term care homes. It provides relevant information at the point-of-care and which helps to increase caregiver productivity as well as improve the resident’s satisfaction with services provided.

Cura™ Tablet puts information that is relevant to the care of the individual in the hands of the carer where it matters most… at the point of care delivery. And specifically, in a manner that is unbelievably easy to use with no prior knowledge of IT.

Cura™ Tablet is a powerful aid in meeting regulatory compliance with tools such as real-time handover notes, reminders and alerts, “how do I” notes with pictures and sound recordings; interactive text messaging to/from colleagues and connectivity to a various parties that are part of the support ecosystem such as doctors, pharmacists, next of kin and 3rd part suppliers.

Cura™ Tablet works in conjunction with a back-end server. It is web-based and runs ideally on standard 7”Android tablets (ver 4.1 or higher). Cura™ Tablet conforms to the highest UK-NHS security standards to protect data.
descriptionShort: Cura provides information at the point-of-care-delivery in long term care homes

Cura™ Tablet works in conjunction with a back-end server. It is web-based and runs ideally on standard 7”Android tablets (ver 4.1 or higher). Cura™ Tablet conforms to the highest UK-NHS security standards to protect data.
descriptionShort: Cura provides information at the point-of-care-delivery in long term care homes

Cura™ Tablet revolutionises the way caregivers use technology to provide better and more efficient care for the elderly in long term care homes. It provides relevant information at the point-of-care and which helps to increase caregiver productivity as well as improve the resident’s satisfaction with services provided.

Cura™ Tablet puts information that is relevant to the care of the individual in the hands of the carer where it matters most… at the point of care delivery. And specifically, in a manner that is unbelievably easy to use with no prior knowledge of IT.

Cura™ Tablet is a powerful aid in meeting regulatory compliance with tools such as real-time handover notes, reminders and alerts, “how do I” notes with pictures and sound recordings; interactive text messaging to/from colleagues and connectivity to a various parties that are part of the support ecosystem such as doctors, pharmacists, next of kin and 3rd part suppliers.

Cura™ Tablet works in conjunction with a back-end server. It is web-based and runs ideally on standard 7”Android tablets (ver 4.1 or higher). Cura™ Tablet conforms to the highest UK-NHS security standards to protect data.
descriptionShort: Cura provides information at the point-of-care-delivery in long term care homes
